评论详情: Hello here I am leaving a review for this jacket :)First off  I had this jacket for a couple weeks now, I have washed it and dried it on Delicate and air dried due to my drier being a bit older . My height is 4’9” and I weight 95lbs. I ordered the extra small jacket and it fits perfectly with such a chopped cute look .This jacket is super comfortable very light Weight, perfect for anyone working out/ going for a run, for anyone wanting to cover their arms for protection inside stores  or outside. I love that this jacket is Not see through which is a bonus in my book .  I live in Louisiana so it’s perfect for the southern heat. I also really love that this jacket comes with pockets and goes with pretty much anything. Definitely planning on buying more. Overall, this is a great purchase :)

This jacket popped up as I was perusing for more running gear that I probably don't need and it immediately caught my eye. I added it to my cart in a few colors, but decided it was probably best if I just bought one to try it on first. Let me just say, I'll be ordering more. It's a super light, but comfortable material. It's perfect to keep me warm in the office that my boss keeps at near arctic temps, but can transition to the warm, Texas weather outside fairly seamlessly. It hits me at a really nice length, coming down just below the smallest part of my waist. I like when my tops and jackets fit looser and this jacket fits the bill. I had originally placed the jackets in a small in my cart while I mulled it over, but luckily after reading comments, I changed that to an x-small. Fits like a dream.  For reference, I'm 5'-4" with a relatively stalky, athletic build and the x-small fits perfect with tons of room in the body and arms for layering.
I wanted something light as a wind breaker and this is a perfect product! It also protects against UV, so it’s a perfect shirt for summer.

This jacket great for the summer, it is lightweight and looks fashionable enough that you can wear it out and about. I am glad I listened to other reviews and sized down because it definitely is oversized. I am 5"3.5 and weigh 115, I would normally purchase a small but I went with the extra small. I could see the sleeves being too short or it feeling too cropped if you are tall but it is perfect for my height.

This is the cutest cropped athletic jacket and was really excited when I got it that it had Sun Protection of 50, which I hadn’t noticed anywhere in the description ahead of time.  It fit well, and is lightweight, and gorgeous on, there was just one thing I couldn’t get over: the collar/zipper jabbed into my neck so hard every time I moved and it would bother me too much.  It made me SO sad to return!

I wear this all the time. It’s good quality material - I’ve washed mine so many times and it holds it’s quality. I take it with me everywhere. I live in Florida and it’s the perfect jacket to throw on if I go in a restaurant in the heat of the summer.

评论概述: Love the color! Super light weight!
评论详情: The material is very light weight and soft, which I love! The color is perfect baby pink just like the picture! The quality is great for the price however it is not super warm so if you are looking for a winter coat it’s not the best, better for an under layer or autumn breeze. Love it!!

The jacket is perfect. Very stylish, I love the way it fits (I got the small), and it's nice and light so it keeps me cool while keeping the sun and wind off me. It crops right at the hips, which makes it cuter to wear than other upf jackets I've had and easier to throw on with any outfit. I love the collar and cuffed sleeves, the zipper is sturdy, and the pockets are nice and roomy. 100% would buy again

评论概述: Looks perfect!! Exactly what I was looking for.
评论详情: I like wearing a white windbreaker jacket when outside… gardening, walking my dogs, running errands. This was exactly what I wanted, comfy & trendy at the same time.

评论概述: Good but exposed wrists *sigh* with update
评论详情: I got the medium. I am pear shaped, even tho its a boxy square crop, its whatever lol..  My biggest con is i wish the sleeves were longer to cover my wrists. Looking at all the photos after the fact, it seems it was designed to have a crop to it when raising your arms - ever so slightly.  Which I'll be doing lots of because I'm an event wedding photographer / videographer who lifts equipment everywhere and all the time.  I'm outside often to capture ceremony, portraits, etcetc. Especially during peak sun hours and high UV. I'm very pale skinned and care about preventing sun damage, burning, and photo aging. So the spf factor was a major selling point to this jacket ( i wouldn't know how to test that tho ). I always use sunscreen for wedding days. Spf 45 Sunscreen blended into my spf 15 makeup. Even sunscreen to my neck, chest, shoulders as a precaution. And I reapply sunscreen spf 50 spray every 2 hours. By the end of one wedding 95° and UV9, the bride - and everyone was absolutely reddened. I was not. So sun care is very very important (at least to me...) and this jacket claims to provide that.  It can be very difficult finding the perfect attire for the job. Before this jacket, i was using an exercise one with a white stripe (good for the sweat but not all black and more casual in look), and an all cotton black one which can start to smell from the day's sweat.  So here comes this jacket, spf protection, all black, and breathable sports wear that can blend in with a professional outfit.  EDIT :// After putting this jacket to use, it is not wrinkle proof. It would need to be steamed every job.. which is what i wanted to grt rid of. Also items have fallen out of my pockets such as chapstick and credit card from bending over while i work. I thought I'd keep batteries and extras in the pockets because it has a diagonal tilt downwards but you should think twice keeping anything in there ESPECIALLY EXERCSING god forbid running. There is no zippered pockets which would make the design so much better. I also don't feel comfortable keeping my phone in the pocket because it feels too heavy for the fabric. And the fabric feels it would sag over time from repeated weight usage. Really a chapstick or a few credit cards is the balanced weight limit lol.  I really wish the sleeves were longer. I will still be applying sunscreen to my face and hands, so it's not a ( major ) dealbreaker. But it is disheartening.  I am still on the search for the perfect jacket. Its fine for now since ive kept it..., but it really isnt ideal and has been a letdown given all I've expected out of it.

I really like the windbreaker type fabric and how big the pockets are. I wanted something a little roomy to throw on over my workout bra so when I walk out of the gym, I’m covered up but the sweat can dry. I like the weight of it since I live in Florida.  But, I ordered the small and it was really boxy and too large in my opinion. I’m exchanging it for an extra small.  I’m 5’4”, 34C (35” bust), 27” waist.

Looks nice and well made. The crop length suits short 5’ people like me. Runs big. I normally wear Small but even the XS was still a bit loose. Annoyed that I received someone’s return - it was all scrunched up and inside out.
Obsessed. Love the boxy fit. Wore this during my 5am run and it kept me both cool and warm. I usually wear size S in most brands and ordered size S.

Love this jacket! It feels so lightweight and fits great - I like my jackets very slightly cropped and this was perfect/hit right at the hip. The pockets are very deep but feel at an awkward location when I try to put keys/phone in and out.
I kept the white one and really liked it at first but then it felt really baggy and very white so I feel like I stand out. It is nice to use at the gym as a cover up.
This is great for wearing on cool mornings and I like the crop top

评论概述: Great jacket for tennis, working out, wearing artound town
评论详情: Love this jacket.  I weigh 110 and am 5'2.  Ordered an XS and it fits great with room to spare.  Perfect jacket to wear anytime.  Got many compliments on it already.  Order it - - you won't be sorry.
Best dupe!
Amazon recommended size was M. I chose to order a S. This jacket runs big. I finally ended up with an XS. I usually wear a 6 in a jacket. Jacket is very cute! Fun design.
I ordered this for golfing, and it is perfect for the cooler days. It is true to size and the material is great, I would definitely order this again!
Love this zip up. Perfect top to add to the golf course.  Nice to wear even when it’s warm to block from the sun rays.  Love everything about it.
This is great jacket for going to gym before and after exercise. I love it.

评论概述: Very cute and good quality. Love it. Perfect for cool-ish days.
评论详情: Very cute and good quality. Packs easily without wrinkling. It's sporty but also looks cool. Highly recommend.

I love a jacket - I removed one star bc I wish there was a drawstring to cinche the bottom, to make it more cropped, I tuck the back in my bra + leave the front loose I ordered a S - I am 5’7 - 135-140lbs
So lightweight and perfect as a cover up or post workout! I am 49 and I got a small and it fits perfect right above my waist!

Bought in white & loved so much i ordered blue too. Lightweight, yet just right for a cool breeze. Great to throw on to go into a store after a game of pickleball. Bonus is the UV protection while I am playing on outdoor courts. Super cute - cropped just enough

I ordered xs black, fits like a small cropped jacket (I'm 5’2, 113lb). The material is like a windbreaker, but also a little elastic. It’s great for summer! I’d like to buy another one in different color :)

I ordered this in a XS and it is till way bigger than I would prefer. I kept it because I needed something similar and didn't want to deal with the hassle of a return. The color is exactly as pictured and is pretty so that's nice. Just wish the XS would have actually fit like an XS. For reference I am 5'1 and 119lbs and am basically swimming in this jacket. You definitely have to wear the jacket overtop something fitted so you don't look sloppy.
Ok

I bought a white medium and a small blue. I usually wear a medium or large in jackets. I am 5'5", 130lbs with a larger chest. I don't mind wearing jackets a bit bigger but the medium just has too much extra fabric in the back. The small fit me perfectly. The blue is as pictured, it's very pretty. The white is fine, but a bit see through, would be better lined, but I may still get it in a small. I think it will make a good layer on airplane flights and cooler mornings for tennis.

I got this for a trip where I would be out in the sun and I wanted something lightweight to provide protection. This jacket was exactly what I was looking for. It has a looser fit and is very lightweight and cropped. There are pockets, which is nice and they're deep enough where items don't fall out. I was hoping to get the khaki/beige colored one, but I needed the jacket pretty quickly, so I ended up with the gray, which is also nice, but a cooler color.

评论概述: Great choice for work or casual
评论详情: Cute jacket for working out but also looks good with leggings and flats for a causal day at work. Very comfortable and flattering. I bought two more!
Super cute! Crop, but not too crop for this millennial!!

Absolutely obsessed! Bought several colors plus one for my daughter! Fantastic summer jacket! I’ve been one almost daily! I even wore at beach to protect from sun! I’d say it’s so lightweight you can have the feel of sleeves without the heat like a good fishing shirt! I tend to run really cold all the time then get super hot fast w thicker material in summer (I do wear heavy sweatshirts in fall/winter). This is perfect for running errands or wearing around house between when I’m sitting and feel a chill vs when I’m doing housework and breaking a sweat. Cannot say enough this is the perfect barely weight jacket for summer!
Awesome quality fabric and design— it feels expensive, but for a great price! I love it!

I love this jacket! It's comfy, breathable, and the best thing is that it's UPF fabric. This a great jacket to take when watching outdoor games. It's comfy and the fabric keeps you cool. It runs a little big (side). I'm 5 feet 2 inches and usually wear small/medium in t-shirts and the small fit me great. I plan to order this jacket in another color, it's so great!

I ordered three colors (white, black, gravel) because I wasn’t sure which one I’d like best. I’m going to keep all 3 of them. I’m 5’2” and 120 pounds, and ordered XS. They’re still a bit baggier than I’d prefer but I guess that’s the style the manufacturer was going for. They are extremely comfortable and stretchy if you need it. The length is perfect, for me it falls right above the start of my hip. The only complaint if I had to say anything is that being that these are thinner material, the white color is therefore pretty see-through, which isn’t a huge deal for me but something to think about.

I removed a star because this SPF sweater fits a lot looser than the pictures show. I ordered the XS and it could loose a few inches everywhere and still have a loose airy fit. It's very large. For reference I am 5 ft 5 in, 98 lbs, size 00 or 23 jeans. However I do really like it and I like the cropped fit. It's really convenient to put on especially when I don't want to wear sunscreen. I recommend this along with SPF gloves!

This jacket is beautiful and light! However, the first day I wore it I spilled a drop of a smoothie  drink in it, and it has been stained since then.  I washed it as soon as I got home but the stain never went away. I tried multiple things to remove the stain unsuccessfully!

I love these jackets. Super cute - oversize, crop cut. I now have three of them. Great for warming up for sports, fitness, or just a lighter weight spring jacket for walking, etc. . . I get compliments on them often.
Love the fabric and so cute
I got this jacket for running and it’s awesome! It’s super lightweight and breathable as well as comfortable. I love that it is SPF too!
I work in a hospital and have gotten so many compliments on this jacket. I’m 5’2”, 120 lbs and the XS fit perfect. Here writing this review because I came back to order another color!
Love, fits well, quality seems great.  Looks just like lulu/athleta versions

Love these jackets because they’re super lightweight. Bought one in the navy color and another in white. The white is pretty see-through which I don’t mind. I’m 5’2 136 lbs usually between a small and medium and got a small. I wish I would’ve gotten an xs for a better fit. It’s a little too big.

This is such a cute zip up! It's extremely light weight and stretchy. I would, however, size down. I usually am a small in jackets, so I bought my size and ended up sizing down to an XS. It was just baggy when I zipped it up, and I wanted a more tighter look. Although the XS is still baggy, it looks more fitted on me. For reference I am a 34D and 130lbs.
This is the perfect jacket to throw on over workout clothes! I want it in every color!!
Durable, light weight, and a cute fit.  It’s perfect for slipping on after the gym.  Dries fast you can also use it with water sports

I’m actually surprised at how nice this jacket is! I don’t want to take it off! It’s a classic work out material, so dog hair and dirt repellent (not like my fuzzy fleece). It’s thin, more of a summer jacket than for actual warmth.  It’s a nice length, not bra size like some crop jackets. It’s below my belly button, like a slightly long cropped jacket with super long arms. I normally order a large but went with a medium with this jacket and I wish I went with a small! It’s a tad too large which is surprising.  But I’m not sure if I want to return for a smaller size because I don’t want to take it off!
Me encanto, buena tela, cómoda, excelente para el gym. Corre grande, recomiendo pedir un size menos. La voy a volver a comprar en diferentes colores.

评论概述: A little larger but I think it’s supposed to be worn loose
评论详情: Great light jacket but it did run a bit big for me.  Also, while it protects from light rain, it does get hot once you zip up; and I wish it didn’t wrinkle so easily (I keep it in the car for emergencies so fold it up and store it in my trunk).  Overall, however, I’m happy with the purchase.
This is a great spring jacket! Very thin but I love the structure and color. Tempted to buy in another color.

I live in Texas and in the summer I wear a lot of spaghetti strap dresses and this is so perfect to throw on when you go into some blasting AC. I would probably buy a size smaller next time but I do love the loose fit. I will be getting the white or black next

评论概述: Quilty is great! Light cooling feeling . The color is excellent.
评论详情: I am going to order more
Looks cute with an athletic skirt or shorts and is very light weight for cooler warm weather!  Great pockets too.
Washes well. Comfortable. Perfect length (I’m 5’1). Great if looking for a thin jacket.
Sizing guide seems to be off. Ordered a small and it was extremely large.

I love this jacket.  It's light-weight, doesn't wrinkle, and fits great.  I have gotten tons of compliments and now half of my son's soccer team is full of moms wearing the same jacket on those cold morning games.  Just buy it.
Love the blue color in person. Fabric is comfy, not meant to keep you warm though

I am always freezing at work so this works really nicely in keeping in warm. I bought an x-small but feels like a small. I am happy I had sized down. It still gives me a lot of space to move around with it. I hardly notice it’s over my scrubs.

评论概述: Perfect for beach days/ sunny climate
评论详情: I live in Arizona and wear this jacket (I bought it in white) when I run errands in the summer for UV protection. It keeps me cool and doesn't get sticky when I sweat.  I also wore it when I went river tubing for 4 hours in 100 degree weather (crazy!, I know) and my skin had no signs of sunburn or tanning. After a few wears I made the mistake of bleaching it which turned it more of a cream color. I still wear it I just wouldn't suggest bleaching if you get white.
Love it!

I got the large and it fits nicely. The material was nicer than I expected too. It's like a step up from a windbreaker material. It's soft and lightweight. I got a 1 black and 1 white. No regrets so far. I haven't washed them yet. I'll do an update if the material wears after a few washes.

This jacket is so great for a loose and casual workout outfit! I also wear it over regular clothes when I want some light sun protection without having to wear sunscreen. It’s a little pricey, but I think I will get a lot of wear out of it. I just wish it was a little more cropped. Between one and two inches shorter would have been perfect!

The jacket is great for casual and dress. Lightweight for chilly nights. Washes well on delicate with similar lightweight dark clothing and tumble dry for only few minutes on delicate because it really does dry quickly. Would highly recommend!

I love this little jacket. I didn't realize how much I'd use a blue sporty jacket. Itb is a boxy shape. In that's fine, but it's so wide and boxy I feel like a size smaller would be better. I bought the small. I'm 5'5 130#. Hem stops at my hips. I have a long torso.
Lo volvería a comprar, me encanta. Es perfecto para hacer ejercicio con el puesto
I purchased size xs and found the jacket too wide and boxy looking and the sleeves huge.
This is a great jacket I take to the gym. It’s a little bigger than I wish, probably should’ve ordered a small where I’m usually a medium. But it’s fine.

I love the color of this and it’s super light  weight. I wear it at work with my scrubs it falls nicely and it keeps me cool it runs a little big I got mine in a medium I think I could have gotten a small but it’s comfortable for medium! Buying more in different colors

Great jacket and perfect for me (5' 1") with short arms. I like the lightweight feel of the jacket. I wear this with my scrubs and also like that it is shorter in the torso. XS was perfect for me and still roomy.
It’s a really light weight jacket. Perfect for summer

I really like this jacket and it does run large like other stated. The XS fit me well and I could have even gone down a bit if able. My biggest complaint is that it formed these pill-like spots after I washed it. I did not dry it and washed on gentle so I am not sure why it did this. From far away you can’t tell but I was still disappointed by this outcome. It is lightweight and great for summer over active/leisure wear.

Completely obsessed. Very versatile jacket, i love it over leggings to work out or even a black bodycon dress to go wine tasting. i like to wear long sleeves on my jogs to protect my tattoos from too much sun exposure and this is super light weight and comfortable even in *100 heat. i'm 5'2, 143lbs and the medium is loose and comfy, probably could have gotten a small.
5'5' 145 lbs, large breasts and medium was bagging off me. Material was nice though.  Not warm, seems nice for a cooler summer day

评论概述: Light weight, stretchy and comfortable but wrinkles very easily
评论详情: Light weight, stretchy and comfortable but wrinkles very easily! I love my new light weight cropped jacket. The length is perfect for the cropped look that’s in. It’s so cute and so comfortable. If I don’t hang it up when it’s not on me, it looks like a wrinkled mess when I put it on. Still gave it five stars because i love it so much and it’s worth hanging up.

A must have for Californian sun protection!  Love the material and style.  Can be worn over work out clothes or over a tank, jeans and heels.  Good quality and very versatile!  Highly highly recommend!  I am a petite sized person w/ a 34/35C cup and the small was a nice loose fit.  Gonna order my second one in XS to wear over sundresses kinda like a sporty bolero.
This jacket is so so cute!!!!  I’ve ordered in several colors and always get compliments when I wear it.  Runs true to size!!!!
Perfect! I’m 5’9 170 lbs, 36 DDD m/l top, ordered M and it’s perfect! Light weight!

评论概述: Lacks quality for the price point
评论详情: Runs large. Medium size, fits as Large looking like regular jacket not showing crop top design. Zipper is low quality full plastic. Fabric is super thin and translucent. Not worth the price.

Very good quality! Exactly what I was looking for, hits at the waist perfectly, oversized but not too oversized and very lightweight. Love it. I ordered a large, my breasts are 36f and my waist is a 30, 28.

评论概述: A tad on the cheap side but good Lulu dupe
评论详情: The collar is a bit light and doesn't stay in place but this is still a great Lulu dupe
Love this jacket! Have it in light blue and black. Only downside is that the zipper broke off the first time washing the light blue one.

评论概述: Cute light weight jacket with UPF protection
评论详情: I really liked the jacket. It was light way exactly what I needed to walk home from the gym. Gave me extra protection. It has nice deep pockets and I like that it’s cropped.
Love mine and it’s perfect for the golf course when you need a little something in the morning to keep you warm but still let’s you take a full swing!

This jacket is the perfect throw on over work out clothes. I wore it golfing on a day in the high 60s and it kept me warm until the sun went down. I'm 5'1" and it fits like a cropped jacket just like the photos. Would definitely recommend.

This is exactly what I was looking for. Very breathable and light. Works great for running or for wearing to work over my scrubs. The length is short but still has good coverage which works well with high waisted leggings or scrubs.
This jacket is so awesome and versatile. Fits true to size and great for on the go. Will order in other colors

Great for the ER where you’re constantly changing from hot to cold, the material doesn’t collect my hair that is shedding or pet fur so I look professional. I can layer I thin Patagonia pullover under it for warmth if needed and it still looks good and fits comfortably
This jacket is INCREDIBLE. Great fabric, great colors, great cut. It is perfectly cropped and feels so much nicer than it’s price - I have 2!

I wear this jacket ALL-THE-TIME. It's the most flattering cut, it's so lightweight, and it doesn't make me feel claustrophobic while I'm running. I love the material, love everything about it. Now I just want it in every color.
Love this light weight jacket! I usually wear a small and would say this fit runs a bit big BUT I wouldn’t size down because you add a jacket underneath. It’s super cute.

I love the color (white) I picked it in. I ordered a small that was the smallest size available, but it fits slightly loose/baggy however it still looks flattering on and I’ll be wearing it over all my workout fits.
Super good quality. Love this jacket.
I’m a nurse and multiple nurses on my unit wear this as a work jacket. It’s lightweight and super cute. Will most likely be ordering again in another color.
I bought 2 of this and i truly loved it, is quite of over sized, but i loved how it looks and feels I wear it for almost any occasion, is my favorite jacket
Cuts wind and UV but not too hot. Great for the golf course

I wear this with my Figs scrubs and it seriously completes the look perfectly. I’m always cold in the hospital yet I get warm easily when I’ve been running around so this was the perfect lightweight jacket to have! If I buy another I’ll probably size down!
Love this jacket. It’s so light weight that it’s perfect for Spring mornings. It is a bit oversized, but, I’d rather that then too small. Washes great and easily.

I love this jacket. I bought in black, but I'm going to purchase in every color available! Every time I have worn it, people have complimented and asked me if it was a lululemon jacket. When I tell them amazon, they're shocked! It's a great workout jacket, light spring/summer jacket.
